channel.title: Comments on: New Active Record scoping syntax
channel.description: Plataformatec's place to talk about Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Elixir, and software engineering

item.title: By: Daniel Huckstep
item.dc:creator: Daniel Huckstep
item.description: Very nice. This stuff has been bugging/biting me for a while.
item.content:encoded: Very nice. This stuff has been bugging/biting me for a while.

item.title: By: Elliot Winkler
item.dc:creator: Elliot Winkler
item.description: I guess we'll will find out once everyone really starts using with this stuff, but all of that sounds like a natural progression, so, I like it.
item.content:encoded: I guess we'll will find out once everyone really starts using with this stuff, but all of that sounds like a natural progression, so, I like it.

item.title: By: Jacek Becela
item.dc:creator: Jacek Becela
item.description: This whole un-hashing to method-chaining changes fit really well in ActiveRelation, yet I kinda don't like RSpec syntax (after using it for one year)...<br><br>Great article Jose!
item.content:encoded:
This whole un-hashing to method-chaining changes fit really well in ActiveRelation, yet I kinda don't like RSpec syntax (after using it for one year)…

Great article Jose!

item.title: By: Sohan

item.description: DrinkRails.com linked to your post as one of the top ruby on rails related blogs of the day.
